Header: Senior Chinese PLA Officer Calls on Commander of the Army
Content: Major General Zhai Yuchuan, Director of Battle Space Environment Support Agency of Joint Staff - Peopleâ€™s Liberation Army in China paid a courtesy call on Lieutenant General Mahesh Senanayake, Commander of the Army this afternoon (19) at the Army Headquarters, Colombo. The Chinese delegation, comprised of a seven-member delegation including Chinese Embassy officials discussed matters pertaining to the bilateral relationships between both nation. Both senior military Officers exchanged mementoes as gestures of goodwill and understanding.
